summary: Small Wabbajack Fix that modifies skill use, weight, damage and reach.
descriptionHtml:
I was looking with the Creation Kit in the Skyrim.esm and I saw that the Wabbajack has got wrong Skill...
I\'ve tweaked the weight, the reach and the damage of the Wabbajack... Of course i changed the skill from Two-handed to Alteration...
Skill: Two-Handed to Alteration
Weight: 10 to 5
Reach: 1.3.000 to 1.6.000
Damage: 27 to 36
Should be compatible with any mod that do not modify the Wabbajack (i think texture mods are fine)
author: caporaletravers
